rating_comment: It is a nice , clean and modern apartment. I went from Canada to visit Bangladesh… so looking for a soundless peaceful area. Mamunur’s place was perfect for me and my family. Hope if I go again Bangladesh, will stay Mamunur’s place.

rating_comment: Beautiful place, excellent location, and to top it all the best host ever. Highly recommend for anyone planning to stay at this location. 5 stars!! Thank you Mamunur bhai

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · June 2022
rating_comment: This is a good apartment for couples. During summer, it may not be a good stay for a family of 4 members. There is an air conditioner in one room. There was only a fan in another room and it is difficult to stay in that room due to the extremely hot temperature. Mosquito nuisance was another problem. It can be a good one during the cold winter months.

rating_comment: Excellent accommodation and facilities. Highly recommended

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Mamunur is a Super Host. He himself and his Manager Abdullah took great care of us and fulfilled our every need promptly. We recommend this great place to anyone visiting Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This apartment is very secure and quiet place for Dhaka Bangladesh. So if you're looking for some peace and quiet in Bangladesh this will be a good place for it. Just be prepared to spend a lot time and money on commute, since this place is kind of far away from everything.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Has most amenities. Host is very responsive and has a cozy home. Would recommend to friends and family when visiting Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2021,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: It was our third stay at Mamunur's. We always found it neat and clean. Very homely. The location is good and secure. We enjoyed each of our stays. Mamunur and his supervisor Abdullah were very helpful. We highly recommend Mamunur's place for short or long term stay in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2021,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
My first Airbnb place in Bangladesh was the best experience with my newly married wife and my parents. The apartment itself is cozy and clean, with plenty of spaces for storage, and I can say I will be a happy return customer.

The purpose of my travel was to get married, and Mr. Mamunur made sure I enjoyed my entire time there without any restriction. I informed the host that some guests would arrive to meet me(not to stay at night), and Mr. Mamunur was okay with that. I made sure there wouldn't be any noise for other people in the building from my end. Mr. Mamunur was so understandable and cooperative.
Location and security are fantastic. There are several parks near the apartment where I went for a walk in the evening, masques near, and two CSD grocery shops near the apartment.

House itself has two bedrooms, and the master bedroom has an air conditioner, and the other room doesn't. Clean, and all necessary items were available at the apartment.
We broke two small crockeries from the kitchen, and I informed Mrs. Mamunur, and she said no worries about that. So I didn't want to the left without telling them about that damage we made. My mom said to clean as much we could before we checkout. So my wife and I cleaned as highest as possible before we left the apartment. I and wifey love my entire renting time, and we will love to rent back again.
Again, I want to say thank you to the host(Mr. Mamunur) on behalf of my family members for giving us such a fantastic first-time Airbnb experience.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · August 2021,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: It was amazing stay there with my beloved family and I felt 100% secure this area and must say his wonderful house . Mr Mamun was so responsive and so kind . They have only one Ac in master bed and one portable Ac for other room .

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2021,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
This is our second stay, one of the best place to stay with comfort and elegance. Very responsive, humble and smart host, excellent interior, a grade home appliances, high speed internet, safe and secure location in a calm non polluted neighborhood!!!
A place definitely recommended for peaceful staying.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2020,  · Stayed about a week

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2020,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Mamunur is an amazing host. He prepared the place for our stay in 12 hours notice. We are grateful for that. We found the place neat and clean. We very much enjoyed our stay at Mamunur's. It's also situated in a very secure location in Dhaka. We'll surely stay at his place when to visit Dhaka again in near future. We also recommend the place to anybody who is looking for a secure and easy-to-access location in Dhaka. Thank you, Mamunur! - Adam and Moon

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2020,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Mamunur's place is nicely furnished and at a very convenient location. Everything is close from his house. He will respond to all your queries in no time. He will go out of his way for your convenience. I will definately stay in his place again!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
There were lots of mosquitoes; however, mosquito nets were provided. A few times there were blackouts and the generator wasn't working.
Otherwise, I have had a pleasant stay and I found the owner helpful.
